location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Charles Edwards, Bushire to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter discussing Mrs Warner's arrival and her ongoing arrangements for her stay in Bushire; arrangements for a gold watch for the Amir [Amir Faisal] to be sent to Kateef [Qatif]; a request to Colonel Disbrowe to return some Residency records and tents; his thoughts on the situation at Bassidore; news of his horses; the intended departure of two French Counts on the Euphrates; his attempts to acquire information on Arabia from Aleppo to Busreh [Basra] and Koweit [Kuwait]; and further news on the damage to the Residency from the storm.
